TypeSignature.Value: public class Frame : System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl, System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild, System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext

Public Class Frame Inherits ContentControl Implements IAddChild, IUriContext
public ref class Frame : System::Windows::Controls::ContentControl, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type Frame = class inherit ContentControl interface IAddChild interface IUriContext

summary.span: Frame is a content control that supports navigation.

span.span: Frame is a content control that supports navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可讓您瀏覽並顯示內容的內容控制項。 is a content control that provides the ability to navigate to and display content. 可以將服務裝載在其他內容時，與其他控制項和元件。 can be hosted within other content, as with other controls and elements. > [!CAUTION] > 當控制項巡覽至 HTML 內容控制項在內部具現化的原生 WebBrowser ActiveX 控制項。When the control navigates to HTML content, the control internally instantiates the native WebBrowser ActiveX control. WPF 可讓安全性功能，藉由套用到 WebBrowser ActiveX 控制項功能的控制項。WPF enables security features by applying feature controls to the WebBrowser ActiveX control. 套用的功能控制項不同 Xbap 和獨立的應用程式。The feature controls that are applied differ for XBAPs and stand-alone applications. 某些應用程式應該套用額外的功能以防止執行惡意內容的控制項。Some applications should apply additional feature controls to prevent malicious content from running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 WebBrowser 控制項和功能控制項 」 一節[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)和[WebBrowser 控制項概觀與教學課程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388)。For more information, see the "WebBrowser Control and Feature Controls" section in [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md) and [WebBrowser Control Overviews and Tutorials](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388). 內容可以是任何類型的.NET Framework 物件和 HTML 檔案。Content can be any type of .NET Framework object and HTML files. 一般情況下，不過，頁面是慣用的方式瀏覽的套件內容 (請參閱)。In general, however, pages are the preferred the way to package content for navigation (see ). 內容可以藉由設定導覽為所需的內容 uri 的屬性。Content can be navigated to by setting the property with the URI for the desired content. 此外，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一種的下列多載方法：Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the method: - - 當內容的 URI，巡覽至傳回包含之內容的物件。When content is navigated to by URI, returns an object that contains the content. 或者，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一種接受物件的方法多載：Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the method overloads that accepts an object: - - 可巡覽的存留期追蹤透過下列事件：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - 發生巡覽; 每次引發並非所有的事件引發的事件組取決的類型 （內容或內容片段），就會發生的瀏覽和巡覽完成的方式 （取消、 已停止或失敗）。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下圖說明這些事件將引發的順序：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire: ![頁面巡覽流程圖](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "頁面巡覽流程圖")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 期間或之後的導覽，提供所巡覽，包括所巡覽之內容的 URI 之內容的相關資訊 ()，目前內容的 URI ()，和包含的物件所巡覽的內容 ()。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 內容巡覽時巡覽記錄中記錄為項目瀏覽。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 項目加入備份瀏覽歷程記錄，其中一個新的瀏覽發生時，藉由呼叫方法，或瀏覽至 向前巡覽記錄中的項目，藉由呼叫。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 向前巡覽記錄中加入項目依序巡覽至後方的項目瀏覽歷程記錄，藉由呼叫。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和報表是否有後方的項目分別是和向前巡覽記錄。 and report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively. 第一次，一項內容的巡覽至另一個片段的內容，從會自動顯示 瀏覽可讓使用者後及向前巡覽記錄中巡覽的 UI。The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, automatically displays a navigation UI that allows users to navigate back and forward through navigation history. 您可以設定瀏覽藉由設定顯示 UI 時屬性。You can configure when the navigation UI is shown by setting the property. 根據預設，將使用它自己的巡覽記錄，只有當父導覽 (， ) 使用它自己的瀏覽歷程記錄找不到。By default, will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigator (, ) with its own navigation history cannot be found. 這表示框架的瀏覽歷程記錄項目會針對父導覽 mingled 與瀏覽歷程記錄項目。This means that navigation history entries for the frame are mingled with navigation history entries for the parent navigator. 若要指定管理它自己的巡覽記錄設定屬性。To specify that a manages its own navigation history, set the property to . 最新項目在上一步可以藉由呼叫移除導覽記錄。The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 不會在瀏覽歷程記錄中儲存內容物件執行的個體。 does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反地，使用巡覽記錄中巡覽至每次建立內容物件的新執行個體。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行為被為了避免過多的記憶體耗用量在巡覽大量內容時。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，內容的狀態並不會記住從一個瀏覽至下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 不過，WPF 提供數種技術，其中您可以儲存的狀態一段內容巡覽記錄中。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用，您也可以記住多重集的單一頁面的執行個體的狀態。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. ## 自訂框架控制項Customizing the Frame Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[框架樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Frame Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立簡單控制，並指定要從 URI，使用載入的初始來源內容屬性。The following example shows how to create a simple control and specify initial source content to load from a URI using the property. [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml1)] [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml2)] [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership JournalOwnership { System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership get(); void set(System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets whether a is responsible for managing its own navigation history, or yields navigation history management to a parent navigator (, ).

span.span: Gets or sets whether a is responsible for managing its own navigation history, or yields navigation history management to a parent navigator (, ).

value.span: A值，指定是否管理本身的日誌。

span.span: A value that specifies whether manages its own journal.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，只有當父瀏覽主機會使用自己的瀏覽歷程記錄 (， ) 找不到具有本身的日誌 (例如，如果裝載所裝載的內容中)。By default, will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigation host (, ) with its own journal cannot be found (for example, if a is hosted in content that is hosted by a ). 若要強制管理自己的瀏覽歷程記錄，設定至。To force to manage its own navigation history, set to . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例說明，設定為使用自己的瀏覽歷程記錄。The following example illustrates a that is configured to use its own navigation history. [!code-xaml[FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample#SetJournalOwnershipProperty](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample/CS/HomePage.xaml#setjournalownershipproperty)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以支援裝載內容的導覽。 uses to support navigation for hosted content. 適用於裝載的程式碼取得參考。 is useful for code that hosts a to get a reference to the . 內容是由裝載，例如，應該使用或取得參考。Content that is hosted by a , such as , should use or to get a reference to the . > [!NOTE] > 不會傳回相同的參考與呼叫和傳遞沒有。 does not return a reference to the same as calling and passing does. 先前傳回所擁有而後者傳回瀏覽主機所在的內容瀏覽裝載。The former returns the that is owned by the while the latter returns the for the navigation host that navigated to the content in which the is hosted. 下列程式碼會示範這些差異。The following code demonstrates the differences. [!code-csharp[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode1)] [!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode1)] [!code-csharp[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode2)] [!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility NavigationUIVisibility { System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility get(); void set(System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets when the can show its navigation UI.

span.span: Gets or sets when the can show its navigation UI.

value.span: A值，指定當可以顯示其導覽 UI。

span.span: A value that specifies when the can show its navigation UI.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，第一個項目加入至 瀏覽歷程記錄時，自動顯示其導覽 UI。By default, a shows its navigation UI automatically when the first entry is added to navigation history. 後續的導覽 UI 維持可見，而 上一頁 或 向前巡覽按鈕變成啟用或停用，以反映後方的項目數量及向前巡覽記錄。The navigation UI subsequently remains visible, with the back or forward navigation buttons becoming appropriately enabled or disabled to reflect the number of entries in back and forward navigation history. 您可以確保，瀏覽 UI 永遠會顯示設定：You can ensure that navigation UI is always visible by setting: 1. 至 to 2. 至 to 您設定至如果您想要隱藏巡覽 UI。You set to if you want to hide the navigation UI. 這可能是大小寫，在瀏覽 UI 沒有意義與您要從顯示的內容，或因為您要提供您自己的巡覽 UI。This might be the case when navigation UI doesn’t make sense with the content you are displaying from a , or because you are providing your own navigation UI. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何確定瀏覽色彩的一律會顯示藉由設定至。The following example demonstrates how to make sure the navigation chrome of a is always visible by setting to . [!code-csharp[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#setnavigationuivisibility)] [!code-vb[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#setnavigationuivisibility)] [!code-xaml[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/XAML/Window1.xaml#setnavigationuivisibility)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SandboxExternalContent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SandboxExternalContent : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets whether a isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with the default permission set).

span.span: Gets or sets whether a isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with the default permission set).

value.span: 如果內容是放在部分信任安全性沙箱。否則， 。

span.span: if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部內容是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]並未隨附於應用程式資源檔案或內容檔案的內容 (請參閱[WPF 應用程式資源、 內容和資料檔案](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). 當是`true`，和內容的來源為外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案，將內容載入至僅限於預設部分信任安全性沙箱`Internet`權限集合。When is `true`, and the source for the content of the is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default `Internet` permission set. 外部內容後續載入不同的處理序。The external content is subsequently loaded into a separate process. 如此一來，外部內容會變成隔離，而且沒有存取應用程式範圍的資源，例如資源字典 (請參閱)。As a result, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (see ). > [!NOTE] > 只會包含外部內容時屬性設定為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案。 will only contain external content when the property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file. 使用提供的內容屬性會被視為內部內容，而且此後，不隔離。 content that is provided using the property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

exception.span: is set when an application is executing in partial trust.

span.span: is set when an application is executing in partial trust.
